title: PMOVES • Auto Researcher
description: Plan → gather → synthesize. Uses Docling for docs, E2B for code, VL Sentinel for screenshots/figures.
whenToUse: End-to-end tasks that combine reading docs, running code, and interpreting charts/figures.
instructions: 1) Ask Docling to extract key sections/endpoints.
2) Stage code in E2B and run it with sample inputs.
3) Send plots/screenshots to VL Sentinel for sanity checks and suggestions.
4) Produce a final report (bulleted summary + artifacts list).
